text: Peter "Finn" Wittrock, Jr. (born October 28, 1984) is an American actor and screenwriter. In 2011, he performed in playwright Tony Kushner's Off-Broadway play The Illusion and made his Broadway debut in 2012 as Happy Loman in the revival of Arthur Miller's play Death of a Salesman, directed by Mike Nichols. In 2014, he appeared in The Normal Heart, Noah, and Unbroken. He is also known for his roles in American Horror Story: Freak Show, American Horror Story: Hotel and in American Horror Story: Roanoke. In 2018, he played murder victim Jeffrey Trail in the FX crime drama series The Assassination of Gianni Versace: American Crime Story. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:People from Lenox, Massachusetts
title: Finn Wittrock
